name: Draculad
description:
A 2D platformer made for Mini Game Jam 118, where the theme was Vampires.

Controls are:

- WASD to move

- Space to jump (Hold to glide)

- Left shift (when available) to dash attack

The limitation for this game jam was "Blood is lethal", therefore touching blood will deal damage to the player.

Team Members:

Programming and UX Design - Sevithian (Seth#9999)

Art and Audio Assets - Jackson D. Iego (JacksonD#1860)

System Design and Art - Zwei D. Star (Zweistar#1987)
